sub_title: Head of Commercial Services at Tata Steel
summary:
Experienced professional with customer focus and relationship-building skills to guide business
performances to a success both domestically and internationally. Energetic and passionate strategic driven manager with excellent analytical skills and always aiming for a win- win achievements.

Proven implementation records and performance improvements on General Management, Operational Excellence and Learning & Development strategic projects. Creative problem solver and people oriented professional who has developed excellent business acumen.

Specialties: 

General Management:
- International teams, Project and Change management, Human Resource, (Technical) Learning & Development, Coaching and Mentoring, 

Operation Management: 
- Operational Excellence, Business Excellence, Supply Change Management, Daily Management, Lean, SMED, Process Improvement

Maintenance management: 
- Asset Management, Optimizing Maintenance, TPM, OEE, Analytical Practical Problem Solving

education.field_of_study: Certified External Assessor for Tata Business Excellence Model (TBEM)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Commercial Services departments working worldwide to serve the Tata Steel Netherlands Customers. With our extended network with offices in the main European cities, the USA and our main production sites we strive to offer excellent service to our customers within Tata Steel Netherlands (TSN).  

The main responsibility of the Commercial Services TSN is: 
1.)	To manage and improve the
•	Order to Cash process
•	Customer Order Book on Order acceptance & processing
•	Delivery performance and Consignment stocks management
•	Complaints management

2.)	To support the wider S&M organization on
•	Contracts & pricelists database
•	External warehouse admin
•	Commercial Master data Management
 
3.)	To maintain Sales (IT) applications and processes to continue our license to deliver

The Commercial Services organization covers all front and back commercial services for the sectors Automotive, Engineering General Industry, Packaging, Building Envelope and Constructions. Within Commercial Services 99 employees are working on different location
profile_positions.title: Head of Commercial Services

profile_positions.description:
As Plant Manager I am responsible to direct and manage all plant operations with responsibilities for production, maintenance, planning, budget  and other production-related activities.  

Some other key areas of responsibilities are to
• Provide direction, development and leadership to production supervisor and shop floor workforce to achieve the goals and objectives
• Develop strategies to increase operations at optimum costs
• Ensure operational excellence and design all continuous improvement activities and maintain process control
• Coordinate plant activities through the planning to insure the total manufacturing objectives are accomplished in a timely and cost effective manner
• Implement and maintain preventative maintenance programs
• Establish and monitor overall plant performance for production and quality standards

See also https://www.sabprofiel.com/
profile_positions.title: Plant Manager at SAB-profiel | A Tata Steel Enterprise

profile_positions.description:
Business Excellence has the objective of improving performance based on the principles of customer focus, stakeholder value, and process management by a systematic use of (quality) management principles and continuous improvement tools in business management. 

My main responsibility was to implement business excellence processes across Europe especially in Tata Steel Turkey, France, Belgium and Netherlands

Lead a business (excellence) improvement and change project in Turkey.
 - Developed and implementing new Sales, Purchase and Finance processes to improve business performance in Turkey and France
 - Working directly with Sales, Purchase, Operational and Finance directors to achieve strategic targets and performance improvements
profile_positions.title: Business Excellence Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Tata Steel Europe has the aspiration to be one of the best Steelmaking Company in Europe. One strategy to achieve this aspiration is to have Operational Excellence (in other words skilled and knowledgeable people).

Lead of the Technical Academy and  responsible for the development and implementation of  Technical Capability and Competence Development Framework across Europe. 
   - Collaborated set up of strategic vision and governance of the Technical Academy
   - The ultimate goal is to achieve Operational Excellence through skilled and competent people. 
   - The challenge is to ensure the ONE Company approach and to consider to local context along way.
   - The key deliverables were to define the desired technical capabilities and competency, to provide an assessment tool, and to deliver development solutions for ca. 22.000 technical employees. 

Manager of a department of 70 employees (7 direct reports),  which delivered ca. 25.000 days of training per annum, average of 2,25 training day per employee. Also responsible for commercializing the activities of the Training Centre on the external market.
profile_positions.title: Manager Learning, Training and Education Mainland Europe

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for optimizing maintenance processes and all related continuous improvement and change management projects. Key responsibility was to implement, monitor and improve the key performances indicators  and key business processes for maintenance
- Lead a department of 9 professionals consisting of 5 Maintenance Engineer and 4 SAP consultants
- 8% time reduction shut down management  and reduction 14% of breakdowns in the installations
- Advising the Chief Maintenance Officer on long term strategy and member of management team
profile_positions.title: Senior Maintenance Engineer Manager
